Reviews.Title: “Bring earplugs, ask for extra towels.”

Reviews.Content: cant isnt nice location middle playas 5th ave shops restaurants clubs front hotels beach club block night amazing fire dancers couldnt sleep nights stayed suite 5th ave noise constant worse ac unit ceiling fans noise morning switched night noise worst clubs street extra towels werent delivered waiting security booth half water shower goes drain half goes outside theres door shower products available bathroom shampoo lotion bath gel restaurant shown hotels website main features operating minibar suite advertised website

Reviews.Title: “Yuck. (Blue Parrot Suites)”
Reviews.Author: TravelinIsmerts
Reviews.Content: worst hotel ive stayed husband love boutique hotels usually pleased staying cheap college apartment 1980s clean huge dust bunnies floor fans sheets stains shower cleaned previous guest cupboards crooked else majorly outdated didnt trust hotel staff smiles passed nod usually overall unfriendly questionable rained 2nd night water pouring front door towel front door crack bathroom water constantly floor due shower matter shower head water shower pooled bathroom floor called front desk 3 times stay time answer completely disappointing experience wished stayed tulum amazing little hotel called happy leave blue parrot stay

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was okay but the nightlife rocks in the area!”
Reviews.Author: surge527
Reviews.Content: blue parrot hotel ok disaster accommodating switched decent clean spacious basic ammenities reception desk unusually closed 9am til 10pm nonetheless care beach nightclub free entrance cover charge guest hotel tons fun dance floors beach aware ladies removing heels platforms sands thats fun removing shoes dancing night definitely hotel looking peace quiet main nightclubs blocks party animals husband highly suggest pay cab worrying drinking driving

Reviews.Title: “OK hotel, but LOUD”

Reviews.Content: blue parrot ok hotel middle action middle 5th av getting loud night music lasting 3 am guess plan stay late party ok stay wont stay

Reviews.Title: “Just what we were looking for!!”
Reviews.Author: ZsaZsa
Reviews.Content: 10 day trip cancun decided daynight trip playa del carmen friends pdc arrived afternoon beach ave stroll drinks shopping drinks dinner couple staying overnight 5th check hotel rates various chose blue parrot 5th pleased rate king queens rate included breakfast consisted fresh toast beach included cover blue parrot club night beach chairs day cute modern touch loved shower separated cement wall friends bit awkward lack privacy hubby care bed hard slept wonderfully amenities included bottles water shampoo soap usual coffee machine dont dont pay attention noise club issue opted stay night clubs yes hear music definately didnt id staying recommending else recommendation mention noise wasnt couple loved loved loved fell love playa del carmen immediately blue parrot hotel

Reviews.Title: “wish we had planned to stay a few extra nights!”

Reviews.Content: meeting friends playa del carmen arrived 2 nights earlier booked blue parrot fifth avenue staff friendly clean location excellent stepped onto fifth restaurants shopping hotel courtyard garden quiet night definitely

Reviews.Title: “Great location. Great service. GOOD VIBES"”

Reviews.Content: friend playa del carmen recommended hotel awesome 5th ave action onwhen didnt front receptionist hanging front hotel ran help soooo nice totally vibes mellow service hanging time mexico anyway awesome loved ambience entering jungle vines draped main lobby hotel cute wasnt luxurious def fit beachy jungle paradise type trip course soooo loud night bc partying streets dont hotel stay playa near 5th ave quiet serene cmon 5th avenue anyway def recommend bang buck

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Staff”

Reviews.Content: husband stayed blue parrot week originally booked 2 nights hotel brought blue parrot 2 days staff accommodating able stay extra 2 nights hotels decor definitely modern lots stone comfortable chair didnt sit bed time hotel 5th ave set little noise location people watching addition hotel 2 locations beach clubs facilities professional friendly staff helped dinner reservation facilitated transport airport received service help bags spite hotel obviously shortstaffed trying manage locations definitely stay
